trans-unit.source: Restrict country selections in front office to those covered by active carriers
trans-unit.target: Restrange listele de tari accesibile clientilor la cele acoperite de curierii activi

trans-unit.source: Two -- or three -- letter ISO code (e.g. "us for United States).
trans-unit.target: Cod ISO din 2 sau 3 litere (de ex. "ro" pentru Romania).

trans-unit.source: International call prefix, (e.g. 1 for United States).
trans-unit.target: Prefix pentru apelare internationala (de ex. +40 pentru Romania).

trans-unit.source: Geographical region.
trans-unit.target: Zona geografica.

trans-unit.source: Indicate the format of the postal code: use L for a letter, N for a number, and C for the country's ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code. For example, NNNNN for the United States, France, Poland and many other; LNNNNLLL for Argentina, etc. If you do not want PrestaShop to verify the postal code for this country, leave it blank.
trans-unit.target: Definiti formatul pe care trebuie sa il aiba codul postal: folosesti L pentru o litera, N pentru un numar si C pentru codul ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 al tarii. De exemplu: NNNNN pentru SUA, Franta, Polonia, Romania si multe altele, LNNNNLLL pentru Argentina, etc. Daca nu doresti ca PrestaShop sa impuna formatul codului postal pentru aceasta tara, lasa casuta goala.

trans-unit.source: Display this country to your customers (the selected country will always be displayed in the Back Office).
trans-unit.target: Se afiseaza aceasta tara clientilor tai (tara selectata va fi tot timpul afisata in back-office).

trans-unit.source: ISO code (e.g. USD for Dollars, EUR for Euros, etc.).
trans-unit.target: Cod ISO (de ex. USD pentru dolar, EUR pentru euro, etc.).

trans-unit.source: Exchange rates are calculated from one unit of your shop's default currency. For example, if the default currency is euros and your chosen currency is dollars, type "1.20" (1€ = $1.20).
trans-unit.target: Ratele de schimb sunt calculate pornind de la o unitate a monedei implicite a magazinului. De exemplu, cada moneda implicita este euro si moneda aleasa este dolarul, se introduce "1.20" (1€ = $1.20).

trans-unit.source: This option allows you, among other things, to restrict access to your shop for certain countries. See below.
trans-unit.target: Aceasta optiune permite, printre altele, sa restrangi accesul la magazin pentru anumite tari. Vezi mai jos.

trans-unit.source: You can add IP addresses that will always be allowed to access your shop (e.g. Google bots' IP).
trans-unit.target: Se pot adauga adresele IP care vor putea intotdeauna accesa magazinul taa (de exp. IP-urile botilor Google).

trans-unit.source: Two-letter ISO code (e.g. FR, EN, DE).
trans-unit.target: Cod ISO din 2 litere (de ex. ro, fr, en).

trans-unit.source: IETF language tag (e.g. en-US, pt-BR).
trans-unit.target: Eticheta limba IETF (de ex. en-US, ro-RO).

trans-unit.source: Short date format (e.g., %s).
trans-unit.target: Format data scurta (de ex. %s).

trans-unit.source: Full date format (e.g., %s).
trans-unit.target: Format data completa (de ex. %s).

trans-unit.source: Upload the country flag from your computer.
trans-unit.target: Incarca steagul din computer-ul tau

trans-unit.source: Image is displayed when "no picture is found".
trans-unit.target: Imaginea afisata atunci cand "nu a fost gasita imaginea".

trans-unit.source: Enable if this language is read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: Activeaza optiunea daca limba este citita de la dreapta la stanga.

trans-unit.source: (Experimental: your theme must be compliant with RTL languages).
trans-unit.target: (Experimental: tema ta trebuie sa fie compatibila cu limbile RTL).

trans-unit.source: The default language used in your shop.
trans-unit.target: Limba implicita folosita in magazin.

trans-unit.source: Set browser language as default language
trans-unit.target: Configureaza limba din browser ca limba implicita

trans-unit.source: The default country used in your shop.
trans-unit.target: Tara Prestabilita folosita in magazin.

trans-unit.source: Set country corresponding to browser language
trans-unit.target: Configureaza tara corespunzatoare limbii din browser

trans-unit.source: The default currency used in your shop.
trans-unit.target: Moneda implicita folosita in magazin.

trans-unit.source: If you change the default currency, you will have to manually edit every product price.
trans-unit.target: Daca se schimba moneda implicita, va tebui sa editezi manual fiecare pret de produs.

trans-unit.source: The default weight unit for your shop (e.g. "kg" for kilograms, "lbs" for pound-mass, etc.).
trans-unit.target: Unitate implicita de greutate pentru magazinul tau (de ex. "kg" for kilograme, "lbs" for livre, etc.).

trans-unit.source: The default distance unit for your shop (e.g. "km" for kilometer, "mi" for mile, etc.).
trans-unit.target: Unitatea implicita de distanta pentru magazinul tau (de ex. "km" for kilometru, "mi" pentru mile, etc.).

trans-unit.source: The default volume unit for your shop (e.g. "L" for liter, "gal" for gallon, etc.).
trans-unit.target: Unitatea implicita de volum pentru magazinul tau (de ex. "L" for litru, "gal" for galon, etc.).

trans-unit.source: The default dimension unit for your shop (e.g. "cm" for centimeter, "in" for inch, etc.).
trans-unit.target: Unitatea implicita de lungime pentru magazinul tau (e.g. "cm" for centimetru, "in" pentru inci, etc.).

trans-unit.source: The ISO 639-1 identifier for the language of the country where your web server is located (en, fr, sp, ru, pl, nl, etc.).
trans-unit.target: Identificatorul ISO 639-1 pentru limba tarii in care este localizat serverul tau (ro, en, fr, sp, ru, pl, nl, etc.).

trans-unit.source: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 identifier for the country/region where your web server is located, in lowercase (us, gb, fr, sp, ru, pl, nl, etc.).
trans-unit.target: Identificatorul ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 pentru tara/regiunea in care este localizat serverul tau, cu minuscule (ro, us, gb, fr, sp, ru, pl, nl, etc.).

trans-unit.source: If set to yes then the localization pack will be downloaded from prestashop.com. Otherwise the local xml file found in the localization folder of your PrestaShop installation will be used.
trans-unit.target: Daca este setat da, atunci pachetul de localizare va fi descarcat de pe prestashop.com. In caz contrar, va fi utilizat fisierul local XML gasit in folderul localizat instalat pe PrestaShop-ul tau

trans-unit.source: Provide the State name to be display in addresses and on invoices.
trans-unit.target: Numele judetului care se afiseaza in adrese si facturi

trans-unit.source: 1 to 4 letter ISO code.
trans-unit.target: Cod ISO din 1 pana la 4 litere

trans-unit.source: You can prefix it with the country ISO code if needed.
trans-unit.target: Ii poti adauga ca prefix codul ISO al tarii, dupa necesitate.

trans-unit.source: Country where the state is located.
trans-unit.target: Tara in care este localizat statul/judetul.

trans-unit.source: Only the countries with the option "contains states" enabled are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Sunt afisate doar tarile cu optiunea ”contine judete/state” activata.

trans-unit.source: Geographical region where this state is located.
trans-unit.target: Zona geografica in care este situat judetul

trans-unit.source: Used for shipping
trans-unit.target: Utilizat pentru transport

trans-unit.source: If you disable the ecotax, the ecotax for all your products will be set to 0.
trans-unit.target: Daca dezactiveaza ecotaxa, ecotaxa pentru toate produsele va fi setata la 0

trans-unit.source: Select whether or not to include tax on purchases.
trans-unit.target: Selecteaza daca doresti sau nu sa incluzi taxele in achizitiile clientilor.

trans-unit.source: Select whether or not to display tax on a distinct line in the cart.
trans-unit.target: Selecteaza daca se afiseaza sau nu taxa intr-o linie distincta in cosul de cumparaturi

trans-unit.source: Define the ecotax (e.g. French ecotax: 19.6%).
trans-unit.target: Formula ecotaxei (de ex. ecotaxa franceza: 19.6%).

trans-unit.source: Tax name to display in carts and on invoices (e.g. "VAT").
trans-unit.target: Numele taxei care se afiseaza in cos si in factura (de ex. TVA).

trans-unit.source: Format: XX.XX or XX.XXX (e.g. 19.60 or 13.925)
trans-unit.target: Format: XX.XX sau XX.XXX (de ex. 19.60 sau 13.925)

trans-unit.source: You can define a range of Zip/postal codes (e.g., 75000-75015) or simply use one Zip/postal code.
trans-unit.target: Poti defini mai multe coduri postale (de ex. 75000-75015) sau poti utiliza unul singur.

trans-unit.source: You must define the behavior if an address matches multiple rules:
trans-unit.target: Trebuie sa definesti regulile pentru cazul in care o adresa corespunde mai multor reguli:

trans-unit.source: - This tax only: Will apply only this tax
trans-unit.target: - Doar aceasta taxa: se va aplica doar aceasta taxa

trans-unit.source: - Combine: Combine taxes (e.g.: 10% + 5% = 15%)
trans-unit.target: - Combinare: combina taxele (de ex. 10% + 5% = 15%)

trans-unit.source: - One after another: Apply taxes one after another (e.g.: 100 + 10% => 110 + 5% = 115.5)
trans-unit.target: - Una dupa cealalta: Aplica taxele una dupa cealalta (de ex.: 100 + 10% => 110 + 5% = 115.5)

trans-unit.source: No Tax
trans-unit.target: Fara TVA

trans-unit.source: (Total tax: %s)
trans-unit.target: (Total taxe: %s)

trans-unit.source: Zone name (e.g. Africa, West Coast, Neighboring Countries).
trans-unit.target: Numele zonei (de ex. Africa, Coasta de vest, Tarile invecinate).

trans-unit.source: Allow or disallow shipping to this zone.
trans-unit.target: Permite sau interzice livrarea in aceasta zona.

trans-unit.source: Search a word or expression, e.g.: "Order confirmation"
trans-unit.target: Cauta un cuvant sau expresie, de exemplu: „Confirmare comanda”
